description.text: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.

ru.original: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.
ru.translation: Настоящая экспедиция. Два куба и база на территории с разнообразным рельефом.

es.original: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.
es.translation:
Un terreno variado para exploradores entusiastas.
Dos generadores y un núcleo.

de.original: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.
de.translation: Geht auf Entdeckungsreise! Zwei Generatoren und eine Basis in unterschiedlichen Terrains.

pt.original: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.
pt.translation: Uma verdadeira expedição. Dois Cubos e uma Base em terrenos variados.

fr.original: Expedition grade. Two Cubes and a Base across varied terrain.
fr.translation: Une arène qui relève de l'expédition. Deux cubes et une base avec des terrains variés.
